title: Ep. 11 CP Takes Your Calls - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P.
description: This week on Where My Moms At w/ Christina P we go over some nightmare mom fails, some dream-like mom hacks, and everything in between! CP shares some more about growing up with her dad during childhood and tries to analyze a holiday Christmas card she posed for as a kid. We take a bunch of your mom questions about how to know if you want kids, what do about explaining Santa isn't real, and worries about raising your kids in the future. You got mom questions, and CP's got mom answers! Send us your mom fails, mom hacks, or short questions you want to ask CP advice on by emails us at WhereMyMomsAt@gmail.com or leaving us a voicemail at (213) 275-5184
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
